### The [AP-LS Student Committee](https://www.apls-students.org/), on behalf of pet-lovers everywhere, have compiled this glorious gallery of pets for your edification and personal enjoyment.

| The pets listed here below are *unofficially* the **Official Pets of the American Psychology-Law Society** and they are *ALL* great pets.

::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}
## Want to submit YOUR Pet?

Have a pet you want to share? Send us them pics!

<a class="btn btn-primary" href="https://forms.gle/sV3nPAzKe5kWi27f7" role="button">Submit a pet</a>
:::
